title: 88/547/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 October 1988 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Luxembourg pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
OF 19 OCTOBER 1988
ON IMPROVING THE EFFICIENCY OF AGRICULTURAL STRUCTURES IN LUXEMBOURG PURSUANT TO COUNCIL REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 797/85
( ONLY THE FRENCH TEXT IS AUTHENTIC )
( 88/547/EEC )
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: THE GRAND-DUCAL REGULATION OF 27 MAY 1988 LAYING DOWN THE DETAILED RULES FOR ALLOCATING THE ANNUAL COMPENSATORY ALLOWANCE TO FARMERS, FORWARDED BY THE LUXEMBOURG GOVERNMENT IN ACCORDANCE WITH ARTICLE 24 ( 4 ) OF REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 797/85, SATISFIES THE CONDITIONS FOR A FINANCIAL CONTRIBUTION FROM THE COMMUNITY TO THE COMMON MEASURE PROVIDED FOR IN ARTICLE 1 OF REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 797/85 .
THIS DECISION IS ADDRESSED TO THE GRAND DUCHY OF LUXEMBOURG .
attachments:
DONE AT BRUSSELS, 19 OCTOBER 1988 .
FOR THE COMMISSION
FRANS ANDRIESSEN
VICE-PRESIDENT
( 1 ) OJ NO L 93, 30 . 3 . 1985, P . 1 .
( 2 ) OJ NO L 108, 29 . 4 . 1988, P . 1 .
